member.summary: Input csv string.

member.summary: Determines what character will be used for splitting based on cell in csv. Deafult is ';'.

member.name: P:Frends.Office.WriteExcelFileInput.lineDelimiter
member.summary: Determines what string will be used for splitting lines. Default is "\r\n".

member.name: P:Frends.Office.WriteExcelFileInput.path
member.summary: Full path of the target file to be written. File format should be .xlsx, e.g. FileName.xlsx
